member.name: T:Joker.iOS.ColorCorrectedTabbedPage
member.summary: Custom renderer to correct the false colors otherwise shown in the tab bar.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.ColorCorrectedTabbedPage.#ctor
member.summary: Sets the correct color scheme for any tabbed page created in the shared code.

member.name: T:Joker.iOS.ColorCorrectedViewCell
member.summary: Custom renderer to correct the ugly selection colors shown after tapping on a view cell.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.ColorCorrectedViewCell.GetCell(Xamarin.Forms.Cell,UIKit.UITableViewCell,UIKit.UITableView)
member.summary: Corrects the selection colors of a view cell on iOS.
member.param: Contains styling information about a Forms cell.
Contains styling information about a native iOS cell.
Contains information about the table view containing the cell.
member.returns: The customized native iOS cell with the corrected color scheme.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.IosFileSaver.SaveToGallery(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the image file contained by the parameter to the iOS photos app, after requesting permission to do so.
member.param: File path to the image resource.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.IosNotifier.ScheduleLimitExpired(System.DateTime)
member.summary: iOS-specific implementation of an API method that schedules a notification indicating the current limit has expired and a new one should be set.
member.param: The time at which the notification should appear.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.IosNotifier.CancelLimitExpired
member.summary: iOS-specific implementation of an API method that removes the notification that indicates that the current limit has expired.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.IosNotifier.ScheduleNewPicture(System.DateTime)
member.summary: iOS-specific implementation of an API method that schedules a notification indicating that a new picture is available to see.
member.param: The time at which the notification should appear.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.IosNotifier.ScheduleGambleReminder(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: iOS-specific implementation of an API method that schedules a notification reminding the user to always record acts of gambling within the app.
member.param: The interval for the time the notification should appear.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.IosNotifier.ScheduleLimitReminder(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: iOS-specific implementation of an API method that schedules a notification reminding the user about the state of their current limit.
member.param: The interval for the time the notification should appear.

member.name: T:Joker.iOS.AppMain
member.summary: Main class of the iOS app.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.AppMain.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main entry point of the application.
member.param: Parameters given from the command line for the app launch.

member.name: T:Joker.iOS.AppDelegate
member.summary: Class responsible for launching the user interface of the application, as well as listening and responding to application events from iOS.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.AppDelegate.FinishedLaunching(UIKit.UIApplication,Foundation.NSDictionary)
member.summary: Invoked when the application has loaded and is ready to run. Instantiates the window, loads the UI into it and then makes the window visible. iOS will terminate the application if if hasn't returned from there after 17 seconds.
member.param: Contains the main processing loop for a MonoTouch application.
member.returns: Returns whether the launching process was completed.

member.name: M:Joker.iOS.AppDelegate.CorrectNavigationBarColors
member.summary: Workaround to fix the bug that makes Xamarin.iOS sometimes ignore the colors set in the shared code.
